integrated.title: Integrated:
integrated.meaning: for those who have completed elementary school.

subsequent.title: Subsequent:
subsequent.meaning: for those who have completed high school.

courses.title: Course(s)
courses.description: Check the {{name}} exam, with {{offers}} course offerings, made available by IFAL.

errors.loading: An error has occurred while trying to load this exam.
errors.noDocuments: This test has no documents available.
errors.noCourses: This test has no courses available.

exams.error: Error when trying to load tests
exams.notFound: There are no tests available now.

search.result: Showing {{showing}} result(s) from {{total}} due to your search.
search.notFound: Your search did not match any results.

login.title: Log in - IFAL
login.description: Log in to your IFAL account, or create a new one, to be able to participate in selections.
login.emailHelper: Enter the email address of the account holder.

errors.fillFields: Fill in the Email and Password fields correctly.
errors.verifyPassword: Check your password and try again.

register.title: Create your account - IFAL
register.description: Create your IFAL Selection System account to be able to participate in selections and more!
register.success: Registration completed, check your email and login.
register.complementHelper: Example: House B, Apt 301, etc. (Not required field)
register.passwordHelper: The password must be at least ten characters long, with letters and numbers.
register.alert: By sending this form you declare, for all legal purposes, under penalty of law, that the information you submit for registration is true to the truth and consistent with the reality of the facts. You are aware, therefore, that the falsity of this statement is a crime under the Brazilian Penal Code and subject to investigation according to the Law.

errors.form: There are fields that need to be corrected.
errors.emailAlreadyExists: It is possible that the chosen email address has already been registered. Please try again.
errors.failed: Your registration could not be completed. Please try again.
errors.verifyPostalCode: Check that this postal code is correct.
errors.couldntVerifyPostalCode: We were unable to verify your postal code.

validator.required: This field must be filled in.
validator.numberOnly: This field must have numbers only.
validator.textOnly: This field must have only letters, no accents.
validator.emailOnly: This field must be a valid email address.
validator.emailEquals: Both emails must be the same.
validator.passwordLength: This field must be between 10 and 64 characters long.
validator.passwordStrong: The password must have at least one upper and one lower case letter, one number and one special character.
validator.passwordEquals: Both passwords must be the same.

data.title: Personal Data - IFAL
data.description: View and control the personal data in your account.

controls.close: Click here to close the PDF.
controls.download: Click here to download the PDF.
controls.goBack: Click here to go back one page.
controls.goNext: Click here to advance one page.

errors.loading: The PDF could not be displayed, please try again later.

backToTop: Click here to return to the top of the page.
backToPrevious: Click here to return to the previous page.
